General.Name: Mistral Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi AS
General.Description: Mistral Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi A.S. invests primarily in real estate-based capital market instruments, projects, and real estate-based rights. The company was formerly known as Mistral Yapi Gayrimenkul Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. and changed its name to Mistral Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi A.S. in March 2016. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Izmir, Turkey.
General.Address: No: 15, Mistral Office Tower, Izmir, Turkey
